snippet: Salvador, the team’s captain, retired after nearly 800 games in 14 N.H.L. seasons. He missed all but 15 games last season with a back injury.
abstract: New Jersey Devils defenseman and team captain Bryce Salvador retires after 14 seasons in NHL.
lead_paragraph: Salvador, the team’s captain, retired after nearly 800 games in 14 N.H.L. seasons. He missed all but 15 games last season with a back injury.

headline.main: Devils’ Bryce Salvador Retires After 14 Seasons
